  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3721</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3721</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Com funciona una central mareomotriu?</string>
            <string language="en">How does a tidal power station work?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie arbeitet ein Gezeiten- Kraftwerk?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment est-ce qu'une centrale électrique de 
marée fonctionne ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como uma estação de potência tidal trabalha?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come una centrale elettrica di marea funziona?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς ένας σταθμός παλιρροιακής παραγωγής ηλεκτρικού 
ρεύματος λειτουργεί;</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Pregunta amb resposta (PAR) sobre què és una central mareomotriu i quin és el seu funcionament. També s'hi detallen els avantatges i inconvenients d'aquest tipus de centrals. Inclou un enllaç per aprofundir en el tema.</string>
            <string language="en">Question and answer (PAR) on what a tidal power station is and how it works. It considers its advantages and disadvantages. It includes a link for further information.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">energies alternatives</string>
            <string language="en">alternative energies</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">energia elèctrica</string>
            <string language="en">electrical energy</string>
            <string language="es">energía eléctrica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">energia</string>
            <string language="en">energy</string>
            <string language="es">energía</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">energia renovable</string>
            <string language="en">renewable energy</string>
            <string language="es">energía renovable</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fragen Sie und antworten Sie (GLEICHHEIT) auf ein welchem 
Gezeiten- Kraftwerk ist und wie es funktioniert. Es betrachtet 
seine Vorteile und Nachteile. Es schließt ein Link für weitere
Informationen ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Interrogez et répondez (PAIR) sur quelle centrale 
électrique de marée est et comment cela fonctionne. Il 
considère ses avantages et inconvénients. Il inclut un lien 
pour de plus amples informations.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Questione e responda (PAR) no que estação de potência 
tidal são e como trabalha. Considera suas vantagens e 
desvantagens. Inclui uma ligação para uma informação mais 
adicional.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Domanda e risponda a (PAR) sul ché centrale elettrica di 
marea è e come funziona. Considera i relativi vantaggi e 
svantaggi. Include un collegamento per ulteriori informazioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι ερωταποκρίσεις (ΙΣΟΤΙΜΙΑ) σε αυτά που ένας σταθμός 
παλιρροιακής παραγωγής ηλεκτρικού ρεύματος είναι και πώς 
λειτουργεί. Εξετάζει τα πλεονεκτήματα και τα μειονεκτήματά 
του. Περιλαμβάνει μια σύνδεση για περισσότερες πληροφορίες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">alternative Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrische Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">auswechselbare Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergies alternatives</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie électrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie renouvelable</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">energias alternativas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">energia elétrica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">energia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">energia renewable</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">energia rinnovabile</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρική ενέργεια</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
